comments.body:
Could we add a short docstring to describe these fields now that we're adding this class to public docs? e.g. something like

```
"""
Wrapper class around the base Python `List` type. Contains an additional `token`  string attribute
that can be passed to the pagination API that returned this list to fetch additional elements, if any
are available
"""
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@    """

    def __init__(self, items: List[T], token):
        super().__init__(items)
        self.token = token
